rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0004, 3426, 3447, 3870, 3965, M20022}

unitName: Planning for supervised professional practice placement 1
description: This unit is structured to assist students in Planning and preparing for Supervised Professional Practice 1 (first Placement).The unit consists of 6 preplacement tutorial/briefings.Students complete Faculty and Departmental compliance requirements in this unit in order to proceed to a supervised professional practice placement.The unit is a prerequisite for SWK 3180
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
